ai.summary: Millwood Trail (Long) is a gentle 4.5 km hike in the UK suitable for beginners and families. The route follows well-maintained paths through woodlands and open countryside with mostly flat or gently rolling terrain and pleasant, accessible scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly compacted dirt and grassy paths with occasional damp sections. Some gentle inclines and small steps; surface is generally even but can be uneven in shaded areas or after rain; boardwalk sections may be present in wetter parts.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you set out. Wear sturdy footwear and bring waterproof clothing; stay on marked paths to protect yourself and the environment. Carry water and snacks, a map or GPS, and a basic first aid kit. Be aware that mobile reception can be limited in rural areas; supervise children and keep dogs on a leash where required.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn are ideal; year-round hiking is possible with appropriate gear and caution in winter conditions.
